tha-ap416:10.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap416:12.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap416:13.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Madhurā.
tha-ap416:14.1_0: Madhurā, the senior mendicant with honey,
tha-ap416:2.1_0: I went to the assembly hall
tha-ap416:2.3_0: I filled that bowl with rice.
tha-ap416:3.1_0: The senior mendicant who brings such a more senior
tha-ap416:4.1_0: Two on a piece, then my bowl
tha-ap416:4.3_0: I’m the last one who says,
tha-ap416:5.1_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
tha-ap416:6.1_0: Mounds, trees, or at a tree,
tha-ap416:7.1_0: This is the last time for me;
tha-ap416:7.3_0: Because of this, I became a noble disciple,
tha-ap416:7.4_0: having entered the rains residence at all.”
tha-ap416:9.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
